update() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Map
Preys and predators move and interact
update() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Prey
Update prey's position, health, etc after each iteration Handle interactions between predators and preys
UPDATE_RATE - Static variable in class CooperativeHunting.ChartDrawer
How many times the chart update per second
updateLeader() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Group
Select leader for the group The leader is the predator that saw a prey is closest to its prey It no member saw a prey, the group has no leader
updateMembers() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Group
Recalculate the group circle center, check for leaving members and updateMove leader
updateMove() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Predator
Update the new position of the predator
updateScout() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.Predator
The predator looks for the closest prey inside the predator's vision Check for the health of the predator whether the predator is dead or not
updateSimulationSpeed() - Method in class CooperativeHunting.GUI
The iteration speed will be changed base on the value of slider
